name: Candy Bam - Lost Dash Treasure
description:
Candy Bam - Lost Dash Treasure is a lovely and colorful, engaging puzzle with shiny graphics.It's a popular puzzle matching game for those who love to pop and create candy explosions.Match identical candies by swapping and swiping them and collecting the needed candy within the available moves.Collect all the points,stars and diamonds and purchase boost your game with power-ups that will help you throughout the game.This surrealism of jellies will make your heart melt and you will feel the blitz of the fresh desserts!Squeeze the juice out of this delicacies plus get some big combos!

Features:
• Delicious,tasty and sweet, your little kids will love playing with the jellies and will blow their minds with awesome game effects!
• Over 100+ breath taking levels
• Lots of game goals, move mode, time mode, collect ingredients mode, etc.
• Surreal graphics, you will want to eat the licorice,cotton candy,icing,waffles in the yogurtland!
• Do your best, get the highest score!
• Match colors in your free time and relax playing a super puzzle game!
• Defeat the blizzard and the storm that the candies bring with them!
• Don't get trapped in the broccoli fury!

How to play

- Match and swipe 3 candy or more to gain new points and diamonds!
- Crush 4 candy in a line to create a special candy which sends waves of lightning!
- Crush 5 candy in a line to create a multi-color blossom which explodes other sweets in the game when combined and bursts lightning thunder bolts
- Combine 2 special bonbon to blitz and blaze a big part of the candies!
- Enjoy this Cake Saga and become a master of the cookies!
- You will find incredible surrealism in the game!
- A myriad of fruits and pudding fever will await you!

Download Candy Bam - Lost Dash Treasure now and start your amazing bonbon saga experience!
